projects.title: Verify
projects.text: Worked on Verify, the web app designed for mobile devices to scan Secure QR Codes.

projects.title: LinkReader
projects.text: Worked on LinkReader, the Android and iOS app designed to scan Link enabled content such as QR Codes, Secure QR Codes, and Watermarked images (think 'invisible' QR Code)

projects.title: HP Reveal
projects.text: Worked on Reveal, the platform that provided a solutions for smart anti-counterfeiting packaging, package tracking, and engaging customer experiences through Reveal enabled packaging.

projects.title: SmartTasks
projects.text: Worked on the front and back end to enable SmartTasks for the HP SmartApp and the HP JetAdvantage Capture app.

projects.title: PageLift
projects.text: Worked on PageLift, the C++ library that enables document detection, capture, and intelligent enhancement. Integrated into HP Smart and JetAdvantage Capture.

projects.title: Feather Frenzy
projects.text: Made this fun Android game with two of my friends in college as a side project. Game is inspired by a mini game from Super Mario 64 for the Nintendo DS.

projects.title: Animal Crossing Price Lookup
projects.text: I made this simple page in an afternoon when Animal Crossing came out in early 2020. I wanted a tool so that I could quickly check prices of what animals I caught. Much better and more acurate tools are out now, but this was fun none the less!

projects.title: This Website
projects.text: This website is written with React!

projects.title: Soon To Be Released HP Product
projects.text: Written with React, and utilizing an HP Modified version of ionic capacitor !
